page.title: 13PENRITH FIRE STATION
page.content: {Station officer}and 16 full time {firemen}work 4hr. shifts, a minimum of 5 men per duty. 10{part timers,}mainly night calls on bleepers.Wide area of 75 square miles, day cover for Lazonby and mutual help with Carlisle. Duty rotas for office manning, engine driving, breathing apparatus.300 calls answered yearly (only 4/5 false alarms) Emergencies include domestic and farm fires and accidents. {Equipment}includes 2 engines, 1 fire appliance 1 learning appliance,petrol generators for lamps, cutting tools, portable pumps for carrying to river/pond, compressed air for vehicle lifting balloons,ladders and different hoses. Foam is used for oil and chemical fires. Water obtained from hydrants. Service also deals with fire prevention.
